text: Group of men looking out to sea near the Queen of the Colonies Pandanus tree at Caloundra, ca. 1905 This is a list of species in the genus Pandanus.Pandanus Linnaeus f., 1782 in GBIF Secretariat (2017). GBIF Backbone Taxonomy. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei accessed via https://www.gbif.org/species/5708186 on 2018-08-30.
